DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety profile , effectiveness economic impact adalimumab use treatment subject active plaque psoriasis adequately respond prior psoriasis therapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Canadian Open-Label Access Program Evaluate Adalimumab When Added Inadequate Therapy Treatment Psoriasis
